channel.title: Posts on Cubscouts Pack 499
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Cubscouts Pack 499

item.title: New Members Onboarding
item.description: 1. Onboard/Register (new/renew) Pre-requisites: Get familiar about cubscouts and the required committments. Here are some useful links. Create account in scouting.org*. Registration: Complete Youth Protection Training*. Complete AB-506 VOLUNTEER PROCESS*. Onboarding: Apply to our Unit Pack 0499. An adult registration is required in addition to paid youth registration. Pay Annual Pack Dues ($75 per youth with earlybird discount until 1st Sep. $100 afterwards). Payment can be done via Zelle (treasurer@sbiapack499.org). This fee covers the cost of Den Meeting purchases and Pack Events such as Raingutter Regetta, Pinewood Derby kits and badges.

item.title: Training for Leaders
item.description: All registered adult leaders and the volunteering adults must complete YPT and maintain ACTIVE status through out the scouting. Additionally, Adult Leaders must take position specific training.
